item.title: Lime parking their bikes in permitted bays, 9th October
item.description:
Lime at night will come with their vans and park new bikes in the resident bay as shown in the image. Please issue a fine to lime as you would if anyone else parked their car illegally in permitted spaces.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mortimer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
